title: Works absolutely fine!
comment: Not sure why it doesn't work for so many people but works absolutely fine for me.  The UI is a little basic but has most of the functionality I need.  Allows you to upload multiple photos which is really useful.

title: Works fine
comment: I love that I can select multiple images in my normal gallery app and then 'share' those to ReGal to do multiple uploads at once to piwigo. Does just what I need and nothing more.

title: Not working
comment: Gives me loads of errors on start and fails to upload at all to piwigo.

title: Didn't work
comment: App just keeps crashing after starting the gallery on my piwigo site. Tried to report the crash but that just failed as this app wouldn't let me do anything else. Had to restart phone and uninstall.

title: Couldn't locate options menu
comment: App launched in to 2 default galleries. No options menu present, couldn't do anything but look at some flowers.

title: Doesn't work
comment: Says there are no pictures in my gallery.   Won't proceed from that point.

title: Crashes when browsing
comment: Android 4.4.4. Piwigo 2.7.2

title: Useless
comment: Does everything except what you would want it for - uploading photos. "Sorry - ReGalAndroid has stopped working" every single time is not helpful. Uninstalling. (HTC One M8; KitKat)

title: Not bad
comment: Works well, but the interface could use an overhaul. Missing a grid like view.

title: New tlds not supported
comment: New .photos tld is not supported by app... I doubt any other new tlds would be supported either...

title: Crashes
comment: Will not upload photo from phone gallery and doesn't refresh gallery dissapointed. Otherwise good app
On my Galaxy S1, this just kept crashing every time while trying to connect. Piwigo app has major limitations, but at least it works.

title: does not support self made SSL certificates
comment: I have SSL enabled on my piwigo server but app fails with sslpeerunverifiedexception

title: Works with Piwigo
comment: Very little control, but you can upload to Piwigo with this app.

title: Not bad
comment: Use to work but seems to crash now upon opening. Tested from Samsung G2 & HTC one xl. Loved the app :(

title: buggy
comment: would be very useful if it wasn't so buggy

title: Good idea
comment: i like this but it is very buggy. When i pick the piwigo gallery, it only loads 1 photo from my gallery and said that it has no more photos. thumbnails of the gallery would be nice too.

title: does not work
comment: Will not connect to piwigo using gallaxy note

title: Great for gallery3 users
comment: Allows me to browse my gallery3 albums remotely with ease.

title: Needs more development.
comment: ... and the icon is fugly.

title: G3 ok, Piwigo not ok.
comment: After a quick run through, it seems to work well with Gallery3 but not with Piwigo. Also, this needs to be updated in the fdroid repository...

title: Perfect
comment: Works great.  No issues, TB and Gallery3 on LAMP stack.

title: Frustrated
comment: Worked back in the summer of 2011, and then stopped working when trying to upload a photo. I have waited for months for a fixed, and now in January 2012, still shows connection errors. Fix it already!!!!

title: Its nice. Its basically act like browser. So far so good
comment: I would love see development being done. Its a great concept. But would like to see more features to added. Thanks

title: Fantastic
comment: Fast, easy, convenient! after seeing a few unsatisfied reviews I was expecting this app to crash. It works GREAT on my galaxy S II.
Cannot use it. Force close every time I want to upload a picture.
A debacle. Not helped by shonky module requirements and vague server-side adjustments. End result being errors without knowing which end is at fault.
Works perfectly with gallery 2 on htc desire
Just started using it, but so far great app. DROID X connecting to gallery2. A bit sluggish at times, but no other app does it better so far
The create gallery functionality does not work(Piwigo).
Lots of errors,browsing some folders works,other gives errors,painfully slow. Works fine via phone browser
Im sorry
Connects and uploads. Doesn't show my g3 pictures or albums.

title: Pretty Sweet!
comment: Overall an awesome app. Using CM7 on an EVO, some force closes that may be related to deeply nested albums. I can live w/ that since the app fills a huge hole for those of us running Gallery3. Thank you very much. I'm so happy with it, I'd purchase a donate version.
Nice. It's working with gallery3. I can even add albums and subdirectories. Used Urly before but this is much easier and u can view your album. Tbolt
Version 1.1 is improved with the ability to upload for gallery 3. Just need the 414 and 413 error fixed!
Great app. Once the 414 errors are fixed it will be 5 star.
Promising, but still needs work, especially sorting of albums (now random). Nexus One
Works on my g2 gallery via my g2 phone, lol.
Nice design, but something with URLs is wrong, because the app constantly returns 414 error codes. Even though the online gallery works fine.
Works perfect on my G3 instal. 5 stars when I can upload
Less functional than predecessor app. Won't show pics fullscreen.
Gets the basic job done. And I don't know of an alternative. Gallery2 on a G2. Looking forward to updates.
Junk... please update!!!
Junk
Gallery3 is very buggy. Will show albums but keep getting bad request when trying to look at an album. Gallery is running version 3.0.1.
Nice idea - just not there yet
So great to have this app. Needs to not switch the main pic while flipping through the thumbnails, until u select one, and going too fast causes FC ty
Has great potential...please continue development. Right now it crashes too often.
Does not accept self signed certificates sites...
I think it is a great app. Developer is very open and responsive to fixes and improvements.
Force closes all the time, cant use it. Using Gallery2 on an HTC G2
This has great potential, but thumb scrolling is sluggish. Also would like thumb only browsing. But good start! Droid x
Force close on gallery3 and HTC incredible
Looks nice with the sample gallery but on my gallery 2 install it always force closes immediately upon access to the gallery. Samsung epic running2.1
Good start app for Gallery 3. It would be nice if this app can support more management function of gallery 3 including video upload.
Not ready for release on market.
Needs a better thumbnail view of gallery, to start. Lots of little issues. It force closes on me sometimes.
